LanguageData.SoS.Settings.RenderPlanet.Desc: If checked, orbital maps will show a day/night cycle on the planet. Disable this option if the game runs slowly in space. Default: off
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.UseSplashScreen.Desc: If checked, RimWorld will use SoS2's new splash screen. Restart the game after changing this setting. Default: on
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.PersistShipUI.Desc: If checked, will show your ship power and heat even out of combat. Default: off
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.OffsetUIx.Desc: UI offset horizontal from the center of your screen.
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.OffsetUIy.Desc: UI offset vertical from bellow the pawn bar.
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.EasyMode.Desc: If checked, will prevent player pawns in shuttles from dying to point defense. Default: off
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.ShipMapPhysics.Desc: If enabled pawns and things not on a ship while it is moving will be sent to the graveyard. This will also restrict shuttle landings to bays or outer hull. Default: Off
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.ArchoRemove.Desc: Removes archo animals if they are spawned into the game before the required building is built. Default: on
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.Debug.Desc: Will draw ship area and list all ships/wrecks on map on screen with mouse over for details and add more info to the log. Default: off
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.DifficultySoS: Ship combat difficulty factor (Min: {0} Max: {1} Default: {2} Current: {3})
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.DifficultySoS.Desc: Affects the size and strength of enemy ships.
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.FrequencySoS: Ship Combat Frequency (Min: {0} Max: {1} Default: {2} Current: {3})
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.FrequencySoS.Desc: Higher values mean less cooldown time between ship battles.
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.NavyShipChance.Desc: How likely navies will appear in random encounters.
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.FleetChance: Random fleet chance (Min: {0} Max: {1} Default: {2} Current: {3})
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.FleetChance.Desc: Chance for random unknown enemy ships and traders to be fleets. Will be ignored at very low or high combat rating.
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.MinTravelTime: Minimum travel time (Min: {0} Max: {1} Default: {2} Current: {3})
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.MinTravelTime.Desc: Minimum number of years that pass when traveling to a new world.
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.MaxTravelTime: Maximum travel time (Min: {0} Max: {1} Default: {2} Current: {3})
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.MaxTravelTime.Desc: Maximum number of years that pass when traveling to a new world.
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.Danger: Dangerous settings (change at your own risk):
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.EnemyMapSize: Enemy fleet map size override (Min: {0} Max: {1} Default: {2} Current: {3})
LanguageData.SoS.Settings.EnemyMapSize.Desc: Will allow fleets to spawn on larger maps with more and larger ships above CR 2000.
